//scripts.rmdir: This command recursively deletes a folder even in environments where the rm command is not available.

scripts.clean: npm run rmdir dist && npm run cleandep
scripts.rmdir: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); try{process.argv.slice(1).map((fpath) => fs.rmdirSync(fpath, { recursive: true }))}catch(err){console.log(err)}; process.exit(0);"
